translations.translation: We will pave his way to Difficulty.
For him We shall ease the way of adversity,
We shall facilitate for him the way to Hardship,
We shall facilitate the path to affliction
So We will very soon provide him hardship.
We will make smooth for him the path to evil.
We will facilitate for him the difficult end.
We shall surely ease him to the Hardship;
Surely We will ease his way unto adversity.
We shall pave his way to hardship,
Unto him therefore We shall Indeed make easy the path to hardship.
We will surely ease him toward hardship.
We will indeed make smooth for him the path to Misery;
We will make smooth for him the path for evil;
We shall surely ease for him the Path of Hardship (the Fire).
We will ease his way towards difficulty.
We will ease him toward difficulty.
[92:10] We shall surely ease his way, We shall pave for him the way, to hardship, to the Fire;
(Surely We will ease his way unto adversity) We shall make easy for him acts of disobedience and refraining from giving to charity, time and again.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ } ونستعده { لِلْعُسْرَىٰ } [الليل: 10] أي: للطريق العَسِرة الوعرة، التي هي طريق الكفر والمعصية المؤدية إلى أودية الشهوات الإمكانية، المستلزمة للدركات النيرانية
